name: Student Project - Eco Sim
description:
This game is a student project for the SAE Institute Vienna.
It has been developed by a team of two over a period of three months.
All assets are made by us.

The game revolves around the construction of a working ecosystem, sturdy enough to please big predators.

The main progression system is built on waves, in which a bear, the predator, wakes up from its hibernation and comes out of one of the four bear caves. In order to fend off this predator, you have to sacrifice some of your animals and food resources. Wave by wave, you have to sacrifice more to keep up with the demands. To do that you have to build a balanced ecosystem, in which your animals can breed. If you neglect that aspect, you will find yourself with little to no God Points (currency) left and lose, as soon as the demands of the bear become too big.
